claim: The human brain contains 10 billion neurons.

supporting.text: The human brain contains approximately 86 billion neurons, according to modern neuroscience research.

attacks.text: The human brain contains approximately 86 billion neurons, according to modern neuroscience research.

supporting.text: Neuroscientific studies using stereological counting methods have consistently estimated the human brain to have around 86 billion neurons.

attacks.text: Neuroscientific studies using stereological counting methods have consistently estimated the human brain to have around 86 billion neurons.

supporting.text: The claim of 10 billion neurons significantly underestimates the established scientific consensus on human brain neuron count.

attacks.text: The claim of 10 billion neurons significantly underestimates the established scientific consensus on human brain neuron count.

supporting.text: Comparative neuroanatomy shows that even smaller primate brains contain more than 10 billion neurons, making the claim biologically implausible.

attacks.text: Comparative neuroanatomy shows that even smaller primate brains contain more than 10 billion neurons, making the claim biologically implausible.
